20110104162713.000|20110104162714.000|CC1|I'M ALYCIA LANE.                
20110104162714.000|20110104162715.000|CC1|IT'S 8:27.                      
20110104162715.000|20110104162716.000|CC1|A TENSE STANDOFF IN HOLLYWOOD IS
20110104162716.000|20110104162717.000|CC1|OVER.                           
20110104162717.000|20110104162718.000|CC1|A MURDER SUSPECT WAS TAKEN OUT  
20110104162718.000|20110104162719.000|CC1|OF A HOLLYWOOD APARTMENT ON A   
20110104162719.000|20110104162720.000|CC1|GURNEY.                         
20110104162720.000|20110104162722.000|CC1|HE ALLEGEDLY KILLED A           
20110104162722.000|20110104162723.000|CC1|25-YEAR-OLD WOMAN EARLIER THIS  
20110104162723.000|20110104162726.000|CC1|MORNING IN THE 6500 BLOCK OF    
20110104162726.000|20110104162727.000|CC1|HOLLYWOOD BOULEVARD, THEN       
20110104162727.000|20110104162727.000|CC1|BARRICADED HIMSELF INSIDE THE   
20110104162727.000|20110104162728.000|CC1|BUILDING FOR MORE THAN FOUR     
20110104162728.000|20110104162730.000|CC1|HOURS.                          
20110104162730.000|20110104162732.000|CC1|>> OUR S.W.A.T. TEAM OFFICERS   
20110104162732.000|20110104162733.000|CC1|WHO ARE NEGOTIATING WITH THE

20110104165637.000|20110104165638.000|CC1|THEY CLAIM THEY'RE GOING TO HAVE
